answers.text:
No, but I would like to do so.

answers.author: Evelina Moulder
answers.text:
Approximately 200 local governments reported having green purchasing policies in place in their response to the Sustainability Survey. I have attached an Excel file with the information from some of those localities so you can contact them.
Best regards,

author: Patricia Himelberger
text: Has anyone incorporated green purchasing guidelines into their purchasing manuals?
title: Green Purchasing Guidelines
